EmailTemplate.name: 201908_EMEAI_GCC_Event_MC.201908_EMEAI_Members_Invite_GCC_Event_MC
EmailTemplate.subject: EMEAI Global Customer Committee Meeting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> You Are Invited TO OUR GCC event Honeywell’s Regional Global Customer Committee GCC Committee Members, It is our pleasure to invite you to the upcoming EMEAI Global Customer Committee Face to Face Meeting, on October 9th and 10th 2019 in Berlin, Germany. Here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Global_Customer_Committee_Agenda_23082019.pdf]]> you will find the High-Level Agenda and below the hotel information. Wyndham Garden Berlin Mitte Please book your room by calling +49 30 495 000 3224 and use the code “GCC Fall 2019” Hotel: Osloer Strasse 116 a 116A, 13359 Berlin, Germany Rates per Single Room/Night = EUR 89 including breakfast Rates per Double Room/Night = EUR 99 including breakfast If you have any queries or questions, please feel free to contact us at GCC@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:GCC@Honeywell.com]]>
REGISTER HERE <[[https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=JuXsln2csEiNr4uTyQpdGNecg6zo2CZDixhcJWIizzpUMzRXM1gwMzcyOUM5SFdSWU45NlEyNENOVy4u]]>
We look forward to meeting you!
João Salgueiro GCC EMEAI Chairman Ghiya Al-Haj-Hasan EMEAI Director, Customer & Product Support
